LTOF (FB)
LTOF (FB)
Â¶
FUNCTION_BLOCK LTOF
Timer of delay.
Q is FALSE, after the delay defined in PT and IN had a faling edge.
InOut:
Scope
Name
Type
Comment
Input
IN
BOOL
starts timer with falling edge, resets timer with rising edge
PT
LTIME
time to pass, before Q is reset
Output
Q
BOOL
is FALSE, PT seconds after IN had a falling edge
ET
LTIME
elapsed time since falling edge at IN
